record.field: ABOVE RATE NOT INCLUDED BELOW CHARGES

ul.li: Above quotation does not include VAT
The actual date of dispatch means the date of loading cargo on vehicle and dispatching from origin point
Shipping packages must meet international packaging standards
In case of occurred VAT refunding charges and local tax will be negotiated who will pay this charges
If required shipper/ consignee must provide special loading instructions
Shipper/ Consignee must provide all necessary documents for custom clearanceIn event of unexpected custom inspection at transit ports there will be additional cost
Maximum weight limit is 21ton, volume- 80 cubic meter
Shipping order must be sent before 5days from loading date

The shipper has 48 hours custom clearance and loading at the origin point. If shipper does not clear shipment through the custom and load cargo within defined period, there will be additional charges per day
Above rate Quotation invalid for nonferrous metals through Russia and for other products, prohibited transporting via Russia

Regarding alcohol, tobaccos, cosmetic and other food shipment through China Health certificate, Test report, COO, CIQ and other relevant certificates are required. For Chemicals shipment required MSDSM and Test report

Regarding on “wooden” products/ rice/ honey/ milk powder/ bean/ corn/ other organic items, XinGang CIQ requires COO and Phytosanitary Certificate by original copy and there will be phyrosanitary inspection chargePage 1/1
